titles.title: Abandoned and Derelict Vessel Removal Act of 2024
Abandoned and Derelict Vessel Removal Act of 2024
To provide for the removal of abandoned vessels, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, and in addition to the Committees on Armed Services, and Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
